publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2657 Robin Harper: energywatch "Stop Now!" Campaign—That the Parliament notes with concern the rising trend of complaints against energy supply companies for malpractice and maladministration relating to their sales techniques and transfer processes; welcomes the launch of the energywatch "Stop Now!" campaign aimed at tackling this trend, and calls upon the energy supply companies to co-operate fully with energywatch and for the Office of Gas and Electricity Markets to use its available powers to ensure that customers are no longer transferred from supplier to supplier against their will and without adequate information or under duress.
S1M-2657 energywatch "Stop Now!" Campaign (lodged on 29 January 2002) Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-2657 energywatch "Stop Now!" Campaign (lodged on 29 January 2002) Sarah Boyack*, Tommy Sheridan*
